flavor: "You can call me Ms. Marvel. And if you cooperate, I won't throw you again."
name: Ms. Marvel
text: "Morphogenetics" — Response: After you play an [[Attack]], [[Thwart]], or [[Defense]] event, exhaust Ms. Marvel → return that event to your hand.

flavor: "I want to be beautiful and awesome and butt-kicking and less complicated"
name: Kamala Khan
text: Teen Spirit — Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a Ms. Marvel card, then add that card to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "Karachi is my home. I patrol these neighborhoods."
name: Red Dagger
text: Interrupt: When Red Dagger is defeated, spend 2 resources of different types → deal 2 damage to an enemy and return Red Dagger to your hand.

flavor: "This hand thing... is getting out of hand..." -- Ms. Marvel
name: Big Hands
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "This is my whole life in one garbage metaphor." -- Kamala Khan
name: Sneak By
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme.

flavor: "Since we're just getting to know each other, a little FYI: I don't like being taken by surprise!" -- Ms. Marvel
name: Wiggle Room
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. Draw 1 card.

flavor: "Are you okay? I mean, aside from being in the worst trouble of your life?"
name: Aamir Khan
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Aamir Khan → place 1 card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck, then draw 1 card.

name: Bruno Carrelli
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Bruno Carrelli → attach 1 card from your hand facedown here. Action: Exhaust Bruno Carrelli → add up to 3 cards attached here to your hand.

flavor: "You're too sweet, squishy muffin. You give people way too much credit." -- Nakia Bahadir
name: Nakia Bahadir
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Nakia Bahadir → reduce the cost of the next card you play this phase by 1.

flavor: "What about that polymer you were working on for the scholarship? The super snot?" -- Kamala Khan
name: Biokinetic Polymer Suit
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Biokinetic Polymer Suit → generate a [wild] resource for an event.

name: Embiggen!
text: Hero Interrupt: When you play an [[Attack]] event, exhaust Embiggen! → increase the amount of damage that event deals by 2.

name: Shrink
text: Hero Interrupt: When you play a [[Thwart]] event, exhaust Shrink → increase the amount of threat that event removes by 2.

flavor: "I guess my mom was wrong. All those years of playing video games did pay off!."
name: Nova
text: Interrupt: When an enemy initiates an attack against you, spend a [energy] resource → deal 2 damage to that enemy.

name: Preemptive Strike
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When a boost card is turned face up while the villain attacks, cancel all boost icons ([boost]) on that card. Then deal 1 damage to the villain for each boost icon cancelled this way.

flavor: That's gonna hurt in the morning.
name: Tackle
text: Hero Action (attack): Stun an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, deal 3 damage to that enemy.

name: Energy Barrier
text: Uses (3 reflection counters). Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, remove 1 reflection counter from here → prevent 1 of that damage and deal 1 damage to an enemy.

flavor: "Uhhh... hold on, Bruno. I think my new dog just teleported into my room." -- Kamala Khan
name: Lockjaw
text: You may play Lockjaw from your discard pile during your turn (paying his resource cost).

name: Endurance
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
You get +3 hit points.

name: Enhanced Reflexes
text: Uses (3 energy counters). Hero Resource: Exhaust Enhanced Reflexes and remove 1 energy counter from it → generate a [energy] resource.

name: Melee
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Deal 3 damage to another enemy.

name: Concussive Blow
text: Hero Action (attack): Confuse an enemy. If you paid for this card using a [physical] resource, deal 3 damage to that enemy.

flavor: "This is a stand I need to take. This time, no compromises." -- Sam Wilson
name: Morale Boost
text: Hero Action: Choose a hero. Until the end of the round, that hero gets +1 THW, +1 ATK, and +1 DEF

name: Down Time
text:
Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player.
Your alter-ego gets +2 REC.
